$interpreted: ???: I'm back for a visit! What's got you looking so miserable?

Li Hwa: Well if it isn't Jing Yu, back to pay a visit after leaving all of Pearl Manor in my hands, driving me halfway to the grave with exhaustion, and giving me no choice but to close and lock up Seamoon Manor...
Jing Yu: Okay, okay, I get it! Well, I'm back now, aren't I? It's such a nice day today, you should brighten up your mood a little to go with it~
Jing Yu: What's wrong? We can go back if you're too tired.
Li Hwa: I'm not tired, just bored...
Jing Yu: Then how about going on a trip together with me?
Li Hwa: But who'd look after Pearl Manor while you were gone?
Jing Yu: Hmm...
???: Stay away from me... Help!!!
???: Somebody help me!!!
Li Hwa: Someone's in trouble! Let's go!
Li Hwa: Are you all right? Where are you hurt?
???: I'm unharmed, thank you both...
Jing Yu: What are you doing out here all alone? Who brought you here?
???: My ma. She said she dropped something back along the road and told me to wait for her. She was taking me to the Jellyfish Tribe to look for a friend...
Jing Yu: Huh? Who was she looking for?
???: She didn't tell me the name...
Jing Yu: Oh... I suppose we'll just have to wait for her.
Li Hwa: (Isn't there anything else we can do...?)
???: And you two are...?
Jing Yu: I'm Jing Yu, and she's Li Hwa. What's your name? It's dangerous out here, we'll wait with you until your mom comes back, okay?
Li Hwa: Jing Yu...
Jing Yu: Don't worry. I'll take care of this.
???: Okay. Thank you both. My name is...
Jing Yu: ...Are you all right?!
Li Hwa: She's fainted. What should we do? Take her back with us?
Jing Yu: We can't just sit out here for nothing. Let's take her back to Pearl Manor.
Li Hwa: "To whoever finds Lian Hsi..."?
Jing Yu: What's this kid doing with a letter like that on her?!
Li Hwa: Let's forget about the letter for now. We should get back to Pearl Manor first, we'll be safer there.
Jing Yu: Okay.
Li Hwa: "To whoever finds Lian Hsi — The child has a most peculiar sickness. No doctor has been able to cure it."
Li Hwa: "I have many more children to raise, and cannot afford to keep paying for her medicines. I only hope that some kind soul will be able to take poor Lian Hsi in with them."
Li Hwa: Good heavens...
Jing Yu: That's heartbreaking... That foolish kid was waiting around Lake Illumina for her mother to come back for her...
Li Hwa: It's a good thing we brought her back to Pearl Manor to rest up. But she can't stay here forever, can she?
Jing Yu: What choice does she have? We can't take her back to her mother.
Li Hwa: The letter says she can't afford her medicines... So what if we took her back, and then gave her mom some money, too?
Jing Yu: But what would happen if the money was all gone, and her illness still hadn't been cured...
Jing Yu: Maybe... You should see if you can heal her first? It might just be that her mom couldn't find the right doctor for her.
Li Hwa: Who knows. But I did check her pulse just now... I've never seen anything quite like it. I'll need to check my medical textbooks.
Li Hwa: ...I'll try my best to heal her, but I can't promise anything.
Li Hwa: I have all my books at Pearl Manor anyhow. Let her stay here a little while.
Jing Yu: Okay. Thank you for trying.
Li Hwa: Even so, if we could find her mom and tell her that Lian Hsi is staying at Pearl Manor while she recovers, that would be for the best.
Jing Yu: Leave that to me. And don't tell her anything about her mom just yet. We don't want to upset her. Maybe we should check in on her first, too?
Li Hwa: Alright.
Lian Hsi: Where am I...
Lian Hsi: Jing Yu... Li Hwa... Is this your home? Where's my ma?
Jing Yu: This is my palace — Pearl Manor.
Jing Yu: We've spoken to your mother, Lian Hsi. You'll stay here while we try to get you all cured, and then you can go back home again.
Jing Yu: She's gone back home to look after your little brothers and sisters. She'll come back for you when you're well again.
Lian Hsi: Little brothers? But I don't have any little brothers. I only have big brothers...
Jing Yu: Oops, my mistake. She's looking after your big brothers and little sisters~
Jing Yu: Let me tell you, Li Hwa here is an excellent healer! She'll have you right as rain in no time, right Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: ...Right.
Jing Yu: Your mom'll be right back as soon as you're better again~
Lian Hsi: Really...? What should I do now then?
Li Hwa: I've checked your pulse already. Now you just have to wait while I consult with my medical books.
Lian Hsi: Thank you, Li Hwa!
Li Hwa: (...Is this really the right thing to do...?)
Jing Yu: Yup. Your mom forgot to tell us where your family lives, though. Can you tell me where to find them? When you're all well again we'll take you back~

Model.Text: I'm back for a visit! What's got you looking so miserable?

Well if it isn't Jing Yu, back to pay a visit after leaving all of Pearl Manor in my hands, driving me halfway to the grave with exhaustion, and giving me no choice but to close and lock up Seamoon Manor...
Okay, okay, I get it! Well, I'm back now, aren't I? It's such a nice day today, you should brighten up your mood a little to go with it~
What's wrong? We can go back if you're too tired.
I'm not tired, just bored...
Then how about going on a trip together with me?
But who'd look after Pearl Manor while you were gone?
Hmm...
Stay away from me... Help!!!
Somebody help me!!!
Someone's in trouble! Let's go!
Are you all right? Where are you hurt?
I'm unharmed, thank you both...
What are you doing out here all alone? Who brought you here?
My ma. She said she dropped something back along the road and told me to wait for her. She was taking me to the Jellyfish Tribe to look for a friend...
Huh? Who was she looking for?
She didn't tell me the name...
Oh... I suppose we'll just have to wait for her.
(Isn't there anything else we can do...?)
And you two are...?
I'm Jing Yu, and she's Li Hwa. What's your name? It's dangerous out here, we'll wait with you until your mom comes back, okay?
Jing Yu...
Don't worry. I'll take care of this.
Okay. Thank you both. My name is...
...Are you all right?!
She's fainted. What should we do? Take her back with us?
We can't just sit out here for nothing. Let's take her back to Pearl Manor.
"To whoever finds Lian Hsi..."?
What's this kid doing with a letter like that on her?!
Let's forget about the letter for now. We should get back to Pearl Manor first, we'll be safer there.
Okay.
"To whoever finds Lian Hsi — The child has a most peculiar sickness. No doctor has been able to cure it."
"I have many more children to raise, and cannot afford to keep paying for her medicines. I only hope that some kind soul will be able to take poor Lian Hsi in with them."
Good heavens...
That's heartbreaking... That foolish kid was waiting around Lake Illumina for her mother to come back for her...
It's a good thing we brought her back to Pearl Manor to rest up. But she can't stay here forever, can she?
What choice does she have? We can't take her back to her mother.
The letter says she can't afford her medicines... So what if we took her back, and then gave her mom some money, too?
But what would happen if the money was all gone, and her illness still hadn't been cured...
Maybe... You should see if you can heal her first? It might just be that her mom couldn't find the right doctor for her.
Who knows. But I did check her pulse just now... I've never seen anything quite like it. I'll need to check my medical textbooks.
...I'll try my best to heal her, but I can't promise anything.
I have all my books at Pearl Manor anyhow. Let her stay here a little while.
Okay. Thank you for trying.
Even so, if we could find her mom and tell her that Lian Hsi is staying at Pearl Manor while she recovers, that would be for the best.
Leave that to me. And don't tell her anything about her mom just yet. We don't want to upset her. Maybe we should check in on her first, too?
Alright.
Where am I...
Jing Yu... Li Hwa... Is this your home? Where's my ma?
This is my palace — Pearl Manor.
We've spoken to your mother, Lian Hsi. You'll stay here while we try to get you all cured, and then you can go back home again.
She's gone back home to look after your little brothers and sisters. She'll come back for you when you're well again.
Little brothers? But I don't have any little brothers. I only have big brothers...
Oops, my mistake. She's looking after your big brothers and little sisters~
Let me tell you, Li Hwa here is an excellent healer! She'll have you right as rain in no time, right Li Hwa?
...Right.
Your mom'll be right back as soon as you're better again~
Really...? What should I do now then?
I've checked your pulse already. Now you just have to wait while I consult with my medical books.
Thank you, Li Hwa!
(...Is this really the right thing to do...?)
Yup. Your mom forgot to tell us where your family lives, though. Can you tell me where to find them? When you're all well again we'll take you back~
